# sqm-document-type-form

## Properties

| Property                  | Attribute                   | Description                                                                           | Type     | Default                                         |
| ------------------------- | --------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------- | ----------------------------------------------- |
| `backButton`              | `back-button`               | Text shown inside of back button                                                      | `string` | `documentTypeFormText.backButton`               |
| `formLabel`               | `form-label`                | Sub text shown above form selection radio buttons                                     | `string` | `documentTypeFormText.formLabel`                |
| `formStep`                | `form-step`                 | Sub text shown at the top of the page, used to show the current step of the tax form. | `string` | `documentTypeFormText.formStep`                 |
| `generalErrorDescription` | `general-error-description` | The error message shown at the top of the page in an error banner                     | `string` | `documentTypeFormText.error.generalDescription` |
| `generalErrorTitle`       | `general-error-title`       | The title for error message shown at the top of the page in an error banner           | `string` | `documentTypeFormText.error.generalTitle`       |
| `submitButton`            | `submit-button`             | Text shown inside of submit button                                                    | `string` | `documentTypeFormText.submitButton`             |
| `taxForm`                 | `tax-form`                  | Heading text shown at the top of the top of page                                      | `string` | `documentTypeFormText.taxForm`                  |
| `w8Description`           | `w-8-description`           | Subtext for the W8 radio button                                                       | `string` | `documentTypeFormText.w8Description`            |
| `w8EDescription`          | `w-8-e-description`         | Subtext for the W8E radio button                                                      | `string` | `documentTypeFormText.w8EDescription`           |
| `w8ELabel`                | `w-8-e-label`               | Label text for the W8E radio button                                                   | `string` | `documentTypeFormText.w8ELabel`                 |
| `w8Label`                 | `w-8-label`                 | Label text for the W8 radio button                                                    | `string` | `documentTypeFormText.w8Label`                  |
| `w9Description`           | `w-9-description`           | Subtext for the W9 radio button                                                       | `string` | `documentTypeFormText.w9Description`            |
| `w9Label`                 | `w-9-label`                 | Label text for the W9 radio button                                                    | `string` | `documentTypeFormText.w9Label`                  |
